name: Token Page NFT Gallery
description: Let's admit it - OpenSea is a terrible place for people to discover and engage in your community. Our customized gallery will give you the hub you need to build amazing experiences with and for your community.

sections.subtitleText: Let's admit it - OpenSea is a terrible place for people to discover and engage in your community. Our customized gallery will give you the hub you need to build amazing experiences with and for your community.

sections.titleText: What does it mean for your community?
sections.bodyText:
Our Gallery let's you own your experience with your community. There's a reason huge projects like [Azuki](https://www.azuki.com/gallery) and [Cool Cats](https://www.coolcatsnft.com/gallery) are doing this, and we get it üí≠.

When you own your experience with your community, not only does your brand value grow, but your community becomes stronger üí™.

With our galleries you can add customized features that suit your community specifically, like adding lore around your creations, allowing your members to customise them and so much more!

Our Gallery starts off basic; it's simply a place for you to show off your best work - your NFTs.

On top of this, you can layer on richer and more engaging experiences. Meme-submission contests with voting, renaming and adding lore to characters, follow-trains, let your imagination run wild ‚ö°‚ö°Ô∏è
For the [GoblinTown Gallery](https://goblintown-gallery.tokenpage.xyz) we built a fully brand-customized gallery. Every interaction feels like your are experiencing it as the founders intended üöÄ.

sections.titleText: Example use case: Check airdrop claim status üçÑ
sections.bodyText:
For the [Sprite Club Gallery](https://goblintown-gallery.tokenpage.xyz) we went a step further and built out a feature to show off which sprites have or have not claimed a certain airdrop.

Instead of having to build an entire new app for this, the experience is native to the community hub üôå.
We're ready to build galleries for all ethereum NFT projects. Get in touch and let's get started - we can have yours up in a matter of days.

sections.titleText: Or we can reach out to you...
